description:
Endo manages to make it into the Nobunaga main camp himself. He manages to get right up to Nobunaga and his identity is revealed. Endo is immediately surrounded, but Chidori stops them, and asks Endo to surrender.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sessha no Shikabane o Koete Yuke
拙者の屍を越えてゆけ
